description_en: One of the few spectra encountered regularly on the Material Plane, iridias are Triune’s messengers and sometimes visit remote worlds where the deity’s original signal was lost. When necessary, an iridia can f re a freezing line of electricity from its hand. Weapon manufacturers have endeavored to mimic this beam with dusk rifles, slender longarms constructed of an opalescent material.
source: Starfinder #49: A Light in the Dark pg. 43
